channel.title: GitHub on DocDock Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in GitHub on DocDock Documentation

item.title: Hugo/Github/Power
item.description: POWERSHELL Overview, how to install Hugo and how to set up the web pages using GitHub as repository in a WINDOWS environment. Since most of the commands have a Linux counterpart you could follow. First off id like to say I wish there was a way to do this with less command line. I initially tried setting it up on GITLAB but I just couldn’t find the material I need to do within windows.
